headline: Fortive Announces Board Designees for the New Precision Technologies Company, to be Named Ralliant Corporation
summary: EVERETT, Wash., February 05, 2025--Fortive Corporation ("Fortive") (NYSE: FTV) today announced that its Precision Technologies segment expected to be separated as a new independent, public company has been named Ralliant Corporation ("Ralliant"). Ralliant is trusted for precision technologies that advance next generation innovation and safeguard mission-critical applications through leading brands in test and measurement, specialty sensors, and aero, defense, and space subsystems.
